sense.gloss: three-pronged vajra flung by Kukai on his return from China to determine the Holy Land of Esoteric Buddhism
single-pronged vajra, tokko, dokko, copper or iron implement, pointed at both ends, used in esoteric Buddhist rituals
ground stone tool from the late Jomon period (named after its similarity to the Buddhist tokko)
ground stone tool from the late Jomon period
